ComputedStatistics - Class in com.eim.utility.statistics.model
POJO representing the non-benchmark related statistics.

It is annotated with hibernate annotations for persistence purpose.
These statistics are persisted in the table STATS_COMPUTED and identified using a sequence called SEQ_STATS_COMPUTED.
ComputedStatistics() - Constructor for class com.eim.utility.statistics.model.ComputedStatistics

computeValuesAtRisk(double[], int, int) - Static method in class com.eim.utility.statistics.utility.StatisticsValueComputer
Computes all V@R.
V@Rs are stored in an array with indices representing values as follow: 0 - Historical CVaR 1 - Simulated CVaR 2 - VaR_1_12 3 - VaR 95 4 - VaR 99
